name: biomni-analyze-chromatin-interactions
title: Biomni: Analyze Chromatin Interactions
description: Analyze Hi-C data to identify enhancer-promoter interactions and topologically associating domains (TADs)
content:
Overview

Analyzes Hi-C chromatin conformation capture data to identify long-range chromatin interactions, enhancer-promoter contacts, and topologically associating domains (TADs). This tool processes Hi-C matrices and regulatory element annotations to reveal 3D genome organization patterns that regulate gene expression.

Input Parameters

  • hic_file (string): Path to Hi-C data file in .cool or .hic format from stash
  • regulatory_bed (string): Path to BED format file containing regulatory element coordinates from stash
  • output (string): Output directory path

Input Format

Provide a JSON file with the following structure:

{
  "hic_file": "/path/to/hic_data.cool",
  "regulatory_bed": "/path/to/regulatory_elements.bed",
  "output": "/output/directory"
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for studying 3D chromatin architecture and its role in gene regulation. Used to identify enhancer-promoter loops that control cell-type-specific gene expression, map TAD boundaries that constrain regulatory interactions, and investigate chromatin reorganization in development and disease.

Output

Generates chromatin_analysis_log.txt containing identified interactions, TAD coordinates, and statistical summaries of chromatin contact patterns.

Category

genomics
